messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Rue's book
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/17/2005 8:15:51 PM Eastern Standard Time, Deborah Harper  writes: Is Rue the first or last name?
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/17/2005 8:15:51 PM Eastern Standard Time, "Deborah Harper" <debbliz@...> writes:

Is Rue the first or last name?<<<

Rue Kream. Regular poster here.

>>>Does her book have a title?<<<

Yes, but I forget what it is. My copy doesn't have the title written down anywhere. <g> Rue?

>>>>Where might we find it once it is published?<<<<

I'm sure *I'll* be pushing it here, at unschoolingbasics, and at the two message boards. It will also be offered at the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference in St Louis, IL October 6-9, 2005----and available for signings by the author. <g>

>>>>Has she published before?<<<<<

In magazines, I know, yes.

~Kelly
